list.title: Google Code Jam
list.detail: Put your coding skills to the test as you work your way through multiple rounds of algorithmic coding puzzles for the title of Code Jam Champ and 15,000 USD.

list.title: Microsoft Imagine Cup
list.detail: Global competition that empowers the next generation of computer science students to team up and use their creativity, passion and knowledge of technology.

list.title: Google Code In
list.detail: Google's contest introducing 13-17 year old pre-university students to open source software development.

list.title: Tortoise and Hare
list.detail: Floyd's "tortoise and hare" cycle detection algorithm, applied to the sequence 2, 0, 6, 3, 1, 6, 3, 1

list.title: Permutation Sort
list.detail: Randomly Shuffle an entire array until it completely sorted.

list.title: Red Black Tree
list.detail: Every node is either red or black. Every leaf (NULL) is black. If a node is red, then both its children are black.

list.title: Instant Sort
list.detail: The fastest sorting algorithm ever with the speed of O(1).
